column3: Latest;Russia: Three Cambodian military trainees studying in the Russian Federation contracted COVID-19
column4: according to report of the Cambodian Military Attaché Office in Moscow
column6: 18 April 2020.------The report added that the three were studying their 3rd year at the Military Medical University of Saint Petersburg
column7: Russian Federation.------The source said the reason for the infection was due to contact with other foreign military trainees. The three Cambodians are in hospital and undergoing further medical examination.------According to the report
column8: the condition of the three trainees is not as severe as they went to a doctor for early detection of the virus.
